phrases: Let us meet up if you are not busy.
I was trying to pretend I did not know.
But I did noticeso much for that.
Wow, she can tell just from looking at the box?
When I baked them for the specified time, they looked a little pale.
But when I baked them a little longer,
they looked okay at first, but then they got scorched and hard-looking.
But I want to try one!
Oh, I was just thinking it is nice to have
To have the girl you like happily eat what you made...
That is what it is always like for me!
I hope you will find a girl you like soon!
And I hope that girl will like
If it is a girl who would smile and eat cookies,
which are as hard as rice crackers, with you...
I wanted to give it to Sunakawa-kun...
I do not need anything in return, so please like me.
To Sunakawa-kun I do not need chocolates in return, so please like me.
So this is the girl who is been sending Suna anonymous letters all this time.
I am sorry for what happened to your letter.
I can just write one again
Let me make it up to you somehow!
Okay, just let me know if there is anything I can do.
Th-Then, can you please hear me out?
Let me tell you about Sunakawa-kun!
Oh, of course you do not recognize me.
We were in the same cherry class, in kindergarten.
Y-You do not have to try so hard to remember.
Why is not she saying anything?
I am not good at this sort of thing, either...
Give me all you have got!
No, I am sorry for making you worry.
I am just not very good at talking with boys.
Even all the way back in kindergarten,
boys would tear up the sandbox, even if girls were playing house there.
Boys would bring bugs and stuff to class.
They would be muddy, even in the morning.
He was often reading picture books.
I would read the same books,
just to learn what kind of books he liked.
He was always so tidy when he ate school lunches, too.
And he was good at dodgeball!
He was really nimble on his feet.
He would always be the last one standing.
I was so amazed by him.
I was behind Sunakawa-kun, so I did not see the ball being thrown at all.
If Sunakawa-kun had dodged the ball,
I think it would have hit me.
You got hit because of me.
I just thought you might get hurt if it hit your glasses.
That is the last time I ever talked to Sunakawa-kun.
You have not spoken to him since?
That was back in elementary school, right?
Since I am in high school now, that makes it ten years ago.
What have you been doing all these years?
Or even when nothing is happening.
I have been watching Sunakawa-kun live his life.
I also gathered all the information I could, and tried to read his fortune.
But you could have at least tried to talk to him.
I cannot even talk to a normal guy!
Then what are you going to do?
There is nothing I can do.
I do not have the courage to talk to him
or tell him how I feel.
All the way through kindergarten, elementary school, junior high, and high school,
every time Sunakawa-kun turned down a girl, I would feel relieved.
sometimes, I do not want him to date anyone for the rest of his life.
Still, every time Valentine's Day comes around,
I consider telling him how I feel.
But I can never find the courage to write my name.
Since I am not brave enough to talk to him,
I am always just circling him.
She seems like a nice person.
Why did Yamato come up suddenly?
Seeing you two so happy together,
It is nice when two people feel the same way about each other.
I could not write my name this year, either.
so I was hoping to give him the letter in person.
But I just ended up carrying it around for a month.
I do not have the courage to hand it to him.
Sunakawa-kun is always so calm and cool.
He does some pretty random things.
I just thought it would be fun if she started calling you brother in English out of the blue.
When he is with you, he often laughs.
I wish I lived next to him.
Then we would have ridden the same kindergarten bus,
and we could have taken baths together.
Not that we do that anymore.
You could take each other's photos in the bathtub...
I have been envious of you for a very long time.
It is true that Suna's cool.
He really is a perfect ideal.
Sure, he is cool, but he is a normal human being.
Are you sure you have not idealized him?
It is not that my ideal is Sunakawa-kun.
No, I can still sense her presence.
What is with your wet pants?
When are you going to stop getting your clothes all dirty?
It is not that my ideal is Sunakawa-kun.
She is in photos with him a lot more than I expected.
all have a hot, molten core inside their hearts,
and they just live their lives, never showing it to the world,
as if nothing is really going on.
Though maybe not everyone is like that.
We are in the same high school...
Um, I think I will talk to Sunakawa-kun, after all...
I thought of a way to start a conversation with him as naturally as possible.
so that you got lost, and I helped you out?
I do not have the courage to tell him how I feel,
but I want him to acknowledge me, just once.
My world and his have never crossed, so...
Around once every three days, Suna goes to the convenience store.
I got lost at the train station!
This nice girl helped me back here.
She is a very kind girl.
We have been in the same school since kindergarten.
I do not need anything, so please like me!
I thought you did not have the courage to tell him how you feel!
But why are you running away?
I thought you were going to fall.
I want to fall in and cool my head!
It is not that kind of river!
I was not planning on telling him...
I did not think he would remember me at all.
I got so overwhelmed, I just blurted it all out.
You cannot undo what is happened.
Cannot I wipe his memory somehow?
Yukika-chan, are you okay letting things end this way?
Do not you want to tell him properly?
Do you think what you have felt for him over the years really came through?
Do not you want it to?
I have been stalking him for ten years...
You do not think he will find me creepy?
He would never say anything like that.
I will go tell Sunakawa-kun how I feel.
I will go tell him properly,
and I will go get turned down properly.
were you the one who always gave me chocolates for Valentine's
If you would signed your name, I would have responded.
Um, do you not like me?
No, it is not like that.
You do not know enough about me to feel one way or the other!
So I do not want your response right now!
Please give me your response after that.
That is one way to think about it.
But you have changed your mind again, Yukika-chan.
Then I will give you my cell phone number.
I am pretty flexible with times.
There are times that will not work, but...
You do not have to be so polite.
H-How could I have done what I just did?
But I am happy for you.
If you liked someone for ten years,
of course you would not want things to end so easily.
I am glad you were not turned down.
Suna, why did not you turn her down?
Maybe I am more of a pushover than I thought.
Actually, why were you with Amami-san?
It was like this, this, and that.
I got the gist of it.
I guess you were good at dodgeball.
It is hard to know what Suna's thinking.
Oh, I was just remembering how you played dodgeball.
You only targeted the really strong players.
You would end up being in a showdown with the strongest player.
Even if they threw the ball at someone else,
you would fly sideways to catch it.
In the end, you made it into a totally different game.
But I guess he did not notice the incident that made Yukika-chan fall for him.
because it is something Yukika-chan should tell Suna in the future.
Why does not she come and talk to him?
Suna, wait here for a sec.
Were not you going to let Suna learn more about you?
Is this on your way home, too?
I hope you can get through to him.
Why is she so far from him?
And he is walking really slowly today.
I am going to take the train from here.
Hey, were not you going to have him learn who you are?
Being right next to him, I could barely remember to breathe.
The Sunakawa-kun was talking to me!
I am at Shuuei Station now.
Sorry, but can I tell Yamato what is going on?
I am not good at keeping things under wraps,
and I do not really want to.
I was just talking to a girl named Yukika-chan who likes Suna.
Um, is that okay for me to know?
I would even like her to give me advice!
Your explanation was easy to understand.
I thought you would talk to Suna like you have talked with Yamato and me.
But you did not talk to him at all.
I barely managed to walk with him without dying, then and there.
I was super nervous when I first talked to Takeo-kun, too.
Standing in front of his apartment,
I could not ring the doorbell and stood there for a long time.
my heart was pounding so hard.
I did not know any of that then,
but I was a lucky man.
To Sunakawa-kun I do not need anything in return, so please like me.
If you cannot talk to him, how about smiling?
I do not think I can smile that well...
If it is anonymous, I can write...
That is fun enough, in and of itself.
Did you get any texts from Yukika-chan?
Sender: Amami Yukika Subject: Good Evening
Would you like to go to the zoo sometime?
Gouda-kun and Yamato-san can accompany us.
If you would like, please let me know what dates and times work best for you.
It says Yamato-san and you are also invited.
Okay, let us all go together.
Suna, are you really okay with this?
If you do not want to go,
I think you can say no.
How you feel is what is important here.
If I did not want to, I would not go.
I am fine to go whenever.
When you reply, be sure to tell her that.
He said he wants to go.
Next time: A Letter to Me.
